Title: NBS to launch price data
Summary: The National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) is set to launch its first price data collected through crowd-sourcing . This new initiative will see the agency provide daily price movement information for the public .

Title: Bianca Censori issues ultimatum to Kanye West as marriage hits breaking point
Summary: Bianca Censori issues ultimatum to Kanye West as marriage hits breaking point . The Australian architect and Yeezy Head of Architecture, is reportedly under mounting tension in their relationship . The couple married legally on December 20, 2022, under a secret marriage license .

Title: Mali, Burkina Faso, Niger seek access to Atlantic through Morocco
Summary: The landlocked nations of Burkina Faso, Mali, and Niger are seeking further options to access the sea by partnering with the Kingdom of Morocco . An announcement on the development was made on Monday during a meeting with King Mohammed VI .

Title: Defections: Ex-Delta governor, Okowa, says PDP lost steam
Summary: Former Delta State Governor Ifeanyi Okowa and current Governor Sheriff Oborevwori have defected to the All Progressives Congress (APC) Okowa said that the PDP has lost the steam to handle the Nigerian state .

Title: Imo stakeholders advocate inclusive policies to maximise climate opportunities
Summary: Imo stakeholders advocate inclusive policies to maximise climate opportunities . Stakeholders in Imo State, including experts in environmental sciences and management, have called for inclusive and resilient climate action through the formulation of policies that would safeguard and promote a safe, conducive, and healthy environment .

Title: Bishop T.D. Jakes hands over church leadership to daughter, son-in-law
Summary: Bishop T.D. Jakes steps down as senior pastor of The Potter’s House Church . He hands over leadership to his daughter, Sarah Jakes Roberts, and her husband, Touré Roberts .

Title: 99% of Ebonyi youths are street hawkers in Lagos, Onitsha — Governor Nwifuru
Summary: Governor Francis Nwifuru of Ebonyi State has disclosed that 99 percent of street hawkers in Lagos and Onitsha are indigenes of the state . The governor said his administration is . …Flags Off Industrial City Project by Jeff Agbodo .

Title: Fulani terrorists controlling 80 communities in Benue, Plateau, Christian group alleges
Summary: Christian Rights Agenda CRA has asked the President Bola Tinubu led administration to rethink its terror fighting strategies . Laments that some bands of Fulani terrorists are currently in control of no fewer than 80 communities in Benue and Plateau States .

Title: Tinubu mourns Shariah Council leader, Sheikh Hadiyyatullah
Summary: Sheikh Abdur Rasheed Hadiyyatullah Iwo was the President of the Supreme Council for Shariah in Nigeria . Bola Tinubu has expressed grief over the death .

Title: Again, two soldiers killed in landmine explosion on Borno road
Summary: Two soldiers have again lost their lives in a landmine explosion on the Maiduguri-Damboa road . Barely 17 days after an Improvised Explosive Device (IED) planted by Boko Haram terrorists killed eight passengers and injured dozens .

Title: My fight for people’s emancipation, Kanu tells court
Summary: Nnamdi Kanu is facing a seven-count terrorism charge brought against him by the Federal Government . He was first arrested on October 14, 2015, upon his return to Nigeria from the United Kingdom . Kanu was later granted bail in 2017 on health grounds after being detained at the Kuje Correctional Centre .

Title: We're true progressives, says Osun gov
Summary: Osun State Governor, Ademola Adeleke, has expressed admiration for the late Premier of the Western Region, Obafemi Awolowo . He made the disclosure on Tuesday in Osogbo, the state capital, while receiving in his office, the Chairman of Odu’a Investment Company Limited, Mr �

Title: 2027: I will support southern candidate, say Lucky Igbinedion
Summary: A former governor of Edo State, Chief Lucky Igbinedion, said that he will support a candidate from the Southern part of the country in the 2027 Presidential election . He said he was not perturbed with the gale of defection in the polity, noting that defection is part of an average Nigerian politician .

Title: PICTORIAL: Bishop TD Jakes hands over church leadership to daughter, son-in-law
Summary: Senior Pastor of The Potter's House, Thomas Dexter Jakes, announced at church on Sunday that he’s handing over the megachurch in Dallas, Texas, to his daughter, Sarah Jakes Roberts, and son-in-law, Touré Roberts . This development comes after he suffered a heart attack in November and filed

Title: Katsina to streamline commercial banks’ operations
Summary: The Katsina State government has taken steps to streamline the operations of commercial banks in the State . The aim was to strengthen the relationship between the government and commercial banks to create a thriving financial ecosystem . The Department of Banking and Finance will provide guidance and oversight, while commercial banks can share their expertise and experience .
